Reviews.Title: WASTED DREAM?
Reviews.Author: james mckay
Reviews.Content: WASTED DREAM? wont charge properly it lags+lags+lagsyou have to push the buttons many times,its no longer depeneble.dont waste your$ after a few its useless.im very upset im crying on the inside,never again  tw520-2012 watch cellphone

Screen: 1.6 inch touch screen, TFT LCD 256K colors, QVGA(240 × 240 pixels)
Network :GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 MHz
Memory size: 128MB. Card slot, support TF card expansion, the largest expansion to 32 GB
Support: Camera, FM,Mp3 Mp4 Player;USB,Bluetooth
